description:
The Day a Baby Boy Was Born
This is the day when Bunji was born, some time ago. Dad, who is trying to reach the maternity ward, keeps on meeting people who need help. Because he`s going to be a father, Dad couldn`t just leave them alone.
A Man`s Hamburger
Dad said that he`s going to make man`s hamburgers. This is something that Dad learned while he was working part time and a dish that women and children are not allowed to help with!
A Men`s Secret
Bunji and his friends are hanging out in his room. When Dad takes a quick look inside, he sees women posing and sketches of women! Dad panics and swears he`ll protect the secret.
Taking a Day Off From School
When Mom was small, she often had to take days off because she was sick. When that happened, her mom would make pureed apples for her. When Mom thinks about it, half of that sweetness is because her mom would be nicer to her than usual...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: The Day a Baby Boy Was Born / A Man`s Hamburger / Men`s Secret / Taking a Day Off From School
男が生まれた日 / 男のハンバーグ / 男のヒミツ / 学校を休んだ日
